00015 /** \file
00016  * \brief Provides the \ref Instructions "Instruction" implementations.
00017  * 
00018  * This file includes the source files in the folder <tt>instructions/</tt>,
00019  * and then defines the \ref instructions lookup table,
00020  * to make sure the all the used template functions are instantiated.
00021  */
00022 
00023 #include <instructions.hpp>
00024 
00025 #include <instructions/flow.cpp>
00026 #include <instructions/environment.cpp>
00027 #include <instructions/globals.cpp>

00034 #include <instructions/hood.cpp>

00037 /// \cond
00038 Instruction instructions[256] = {
00039 #   define INSTRUCTION(name) Instructions::name,
00040 #   define INSTRUCTION_N(name,n) Instructions::name##_N<n>,
00041 #   include <delftproto.instructions>
00042 #   undef INSTRUCTION
00043 #   undef INSTRUCTION_N
00044 };
